title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Gather input from stakeholders and subject matter experts. Conduct a feasibility study, identify risks and constraints, and define success criteria.

title: System Architecture Design
description:
Design the overall system architecture for the AutoMLWorkbench, including components, data flow, integration points, and considerations for scalability, maintainability, and performance. The architecture should cover the following key areas:

1. Data ingestion and preprocessing
2. Model training and evaluation
3. Model deployment and serving
4. User interface and workflow management
5. Monitoring and logging
6. Security and access control
7. Scalability and load balancing
8. Integration with external data sources and services

title: Data Pipeline and Storage Design
description: Design the data ingestion, processing, and storage components of the system.

title: Model Training and Deployment Design
description: Design the model training and deployment components, including automation and monitoring.

title: User Interface and Experience Design
description: Design the user interface and experience for data scientists to interact with the workbench.
